name: typedoc-plugin-markdown
description: A plugin for TypeDoc that exposes a theme and additional arguments for rendering markdown.

scripts.examples: rm -rf examples/out && typedoc ./examples/src --out ./examples/out --theme markdown --gitRevision master --readme none --media test/src/media/ --includes test/src/inc/
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsc -p ./src/tsconfig.json && npm run copy:static
scripts.prepare: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test
scripts.compile: npm run compile:markdown && npm run compile:html
scripts.compile:markdown: npm run build && npm run pretest && typedoc ./test/src -out ./test/out/markdown/modules --options ./test/options.json

author: Thomas Grey
